text: This is the tale of the strangeadventures of young Allan Gray,
title: Vampyr

text: who immersed himself in the studyof devil worship and vampires.
title: Vampyr

text: Preoccupied with superstitionsof centuries past, he became a dreamer
title: Vampyr

text: for whom the line between the realand the supernatural became blurred.
